about_the_game:
Rejuvan is a first person factory game with various elements of exploration and discovery. You have the freedom to do anything, whether that includes creating the most efficient factory to maximize profits or to just sacrifice yourself in the volcano in the gods' favor.

You will only start with a few rudimentary items. Don't worry as you'll swiftly advance through the game if you manage to calculate the optimal strategy for maintaining a profit and making your factory scalable for future changes.

Structures

The three main types of items are:

DROPPERS: These structures create the primitive version of ores. The ores are selected from veins that each dropper may be able to mine from. Some droppers may behave differently though, creating never-before-seen ores or even being overall dangerous to your base by just existing.

CONVEYORS: These structures are responsible for transporting and refining ores. Some conveyors feature attached upgraders that increase the ore's value. Others have unique mechanisms to destroy, separate, elevate, or even launch ores.

FURNACES: These constructs mark the end of an ore's lifecycle. Furnaces not only return money in exchange for ore but can also upgrade them one last time. Some furnaces do not accept upgraded ores; however, they provide a much higher multiplier with little to no effort.

A good setup contains a combination of all types of buildings to make the most out of all you can get. 

Rejuvenation

After reaching a lot of money, you can sacrifice your progress in favor of a new item. This item will not disappear in any subsequent Rejuvenations.

Is this game worth it?

If you are looking for a good time either alone of with your friends, Rejuvan is a great choice that will get you hooked for quite a while.

Don't forget to join the discord server, since all administrators are active and will respond to your messages. You can also leave suggestions, bug reports and other there.

  • Processor: i5 10400F 2.9GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 ti

short_description: Build, make money, create, repeat. Rejuvan is a game about making the most efficient factories on your own little island. Use everything you can think of to maximize profits and keep the narrative on track. Keep in mind that, at certain money thresholds, your experience may unexpectedly change.
